metadata.Title: CVE-2017-8891 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description:
Dropbox Lepton 1.2.1 allows DoS (SEGV and application crash) via a malformed lepton file because the code does not ensure setup of a correct number of threads.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-8891` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

lepton - 1.2.1+20170405-3build1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: lepton package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.2.1+20170405-3build1').
